attributes.action: properly enforce the widely ignored 70mph speed limit on motorways.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This measure would have environmental benefits, discourage the use of motorways by the irresponsible and would not discriminate against responsible low income families; unlike many other green taxes.

rejection.details: Enforcement is a matter for the police.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
